LearningCourse.name: LearningCourse
LearningCourse.description: Represents information about a course thatâ€™s required in a learning framework.

AcademicLevel.description: The applicable point in the education process.

ActiveFromDate.description: Date the Learning framework became active.

ActiveToDate.description: Date the Learning framework became inactive.

CipCode.description: Classification of Instructional Programming code that identifies the program or field of study.

CourseLevelDescription.description: The general type or level of instruction provided throughout the course.

CourseNumber.description: The number that identifies the level of the course and helps organize the course catalog.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency.

Description.description: The description of the Learning Course.

Duration.description: The allocated length of time for completion of the Learning Course.

DurationUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the length of time for completion.

FieldOfStudy.description: The academic subject related to the course of study.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Learning Course is active (true) or not (false).

IsLinkedOnly.description: Indicates whether the Learning Course is a linked-only course (true) or not (false).

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearningId.description: Learning (unique parent field) associated with a Learning Course.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Name of a course of study that represents a single unit of teaching that typically lasts one term.

ProviderId.description: The Account of the institution that provides the Learning Course.

SubjectAbbreviation.description: Abbreviation of the Academic Subject for the course of study. For example, MAT = Mathematics.
